name: A Home in the Forest
description:
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/home-forest

A 2D game about exploration and collecting items to build shelter in a forest. You will encounter enemies along the way.
You will need to avoid monsters while collecting treasures for your "home" in the forest.

Credits: 

Tanya - Project Manager, Audio, Art

Sean - Game Designer, Coding

Terrence - Coding, Audio, Database Management

Ryan - Character & Environment Artist

Adam - Character, Prop Design & Animation

Kevin - Coding
